Missing Marokopa family: Credible sighting of Tom Phillips and three children confirmed by police https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/credible-sighting-of- Three-missing-marokopa-children-confirmed-by-police/CVGDYQAP3ZB6HJFYKVN4ZXHJTI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/credible-sighting-of- Three-missing-marokopa-children-confirmed-by-police/CVGDYQAP3ZB6HJFYKVN4ZXHJTI/ The family has been missing since December 2021. Mon, 07 Oct 2024 01:03:11 +0000 Tom Phillips and his three children Jayda, Maverick and Ember were reported missing from Marokopa by family on 18 January 2022.

Gizzy surfers at New Zealand scholastic surfing championships https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/10/07/gizzy-surfers-at-new-zealand-scholastic-surfing-championships/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/2024/10/07/gizzy-surfers-at-new-zealand-scholastic-surfing-championships/ Murray RobertsonA team of 12 from Tairawhiti in action at the national scholastics Mon, 07 Oct 2024 00:54:31 +0000 The Tairawhiti team to the New Zealand scholastics surfing championships left Gisborne at the weekend for Dunedin - (From left) James Fowell (coach), Jett Dalton, William mathews. Lucy Mc Diarmid, Austin Fergus, Bonnie Lynch, Flynn McGregor, Charlotte Mc Diarmid, Max Gaddum, Te Waitou Fairlie, Ollie Tong, Max Phillips, Damon Gunness ( manager) Oscar Gunness, Regan Fairlie (assistant coach) and Holly Tong (female extraordinaire and manager).
